description:
Rito is a shy boy just trying to get through life and pluck up the courage to confess his love to his long time school crush. Of course, the universe seems to be against him, even to the point of dropping a naked runaway alien princess named Lala quite literally into his lap and bathtub.  As if things couldn`t get stranger, in the suds and confusion, Rito now finds himself engaged to the girl who fell from the sky.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fille qui tombait du ciel
The Girl Who Fell from the Sky
